name: Microwave
detail:
A microwave is a small oven that cooks or heats food very quickly.
        Instead of the electric or gas heat that a regular oven uses,
        a microwave heats with electromagnetic radiation.

name: Steam
detail: Steaming is a method of cooking that requires moist heat.

name: Meals
detail:
Any of the regular occasions in a day when a reasonably large amount of food
        is eaten, such as breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
